Elasticsearch-esql

Help

SQL queries

Use SQL-like queries against elasticsearch. The results will be displayed in the table. You can use autocomple to write your queries easier.

Keyboard tips

General editing
Ctrl + Space
Open Auto complete
Ctrl + Enter
Submit query
When auto-complete is visible
Arrows
Use arrows to select the term to auto complete.
Enter/Tab
Select the currently selected auto-complete menu
Esc
Close auto-complete menu
Got it
